scan_table_check.description: Starting with the Quebec release, Subscription Management provides you the ability to monitor your user-based subscriptions by leveraging groups. Using groups, you can manage your subscription consumption as part of your normal process without having to manage security and entitlement separately. When assigning roles to users you should assign the roles to a group and add users to the group. Avoid directly assigning roles to users whenever possible, as you have no control over subscription consumption that way. This scan finds all users which have licensed roles that have been assigned to them directly. Only the admin user is excluded to make sure, that this user is always able to login.
scan_table_check.name: User with direct Assignments of licensable Roles
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Remove direct assigned roles which are licensable from the listed users and put them into group which have the required roles assigned.
scan_table_check.short_description: User with direct Assignments of licensable Roles
